system.description:
You're a natural commander, and you find people fall into line when you speak up. So in this trying time, you need to raise your voice and get your team moving.

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Leader, you must have 3 or more Bonds with at least two Companions.

The Leader starts with To The Gates of Hell Itself.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.leader.Item.MIkXdMcXNkKtAu1x]{TO THE GATES OF HELL ITSELF}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.leader.Item.DD7ijWrH0sBScI8k]{DISCIPLINARY ACTION}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.leader.Item.1763m50dQ41mhnHq]{DON'T LET YOUR DREAMS JUST BE DREAMS}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.leader.Item.CwewDjnsr72kPadV]{EXPERT COMMANDER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.leader.Item.QvNCsXEQtJkKnMsh]{INSPIRING PRESENCE}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.leader.Item.Ocfgy8eEiUyzzkGu]{RECRUITMENT DRIVE}

advancements.name: Take the Heir's Core Moves (Royal Treatment and Yes, My Liege). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
